hooks.prompt: Extract and return as additionalContext the following from the conversation if present: (1) the [SESSION] marker line, (2) any intent brief sections (OBJECTIVE, NON-GOALS, ACCEPTANCE, STOP), (3) shape output (criteria[], mustNot[]), (4) current loop progress (wave number, completed items). Format as a compact summary. Input: $ARGUMENTS
Check if all tasks are complete. If not, respond with {"ok": false, "reason": "what remains to be done"}.
